奪.definition: to seize; to take away forcibly; to wrest control of; to compete or strive for; to force one's way through; to leave out; to lose

奪冠.definition: to seize the crown; fig. to win a championship; to win gold medal

奪取.definition: to seize; to capture; to wrest control of

奪回.definition: to take back (forcibly); to recapture; to win back

奪得.definition: to take (after a struggle); to wrest; to seize; to capture; to win (a trophy)

奪舍.definition: to incarnate into sb else's body

奪金.definition: to snatch gold; to take first place in a competition

奪門而出.definition: to rush out through a door (idiom)
